programmes.show_description: Join us in welcoming Claina Palmer Designs to the HobbyMaker Family, bringing SVG sized projects to crafters who love to die cut. Discover how you can create unique 3D projects.
Join Sharon for the release of the New Spring Pouch, A6 Stamp Sets featuring You Mean So Mush. Plus, discover the brand-new die sets, including Tatty Circles and Squares.
Celebrate the season with Hero Arts' Spring Meadow collection - fresh, floral designs that bring the beauty of nature to your crafts!
From the Art World to the Craft World, Leonie returns with a stunning collection of stamp sets, stencils, and more, designed to inspire your next creative project.
HobbyMaker Repeats.
HobbyMaker Repeats.
HobbyMaker Repeats.
Paula Milner joins us for the Crafty Lass Fabric Launch!
Anthea Venn joins us with her latest Once Upon A Time BOTM, alongside some fantastic Easter projects.
Kim Reynolds will be bringing us a brilliant new Easter themed Log Cabin Cushion Panel, and strips to use to make your own Log Cabin Cushion.
Anthea Venn joins us for another hour of Spring & Easter makes.
Kim Reynolds will be demonstrating the brand new Henry Glass Blockstar Quilt Kit.
Gwen demonstrates Sue Wilson's Easter 2026 collection, offering creative ideas and inspiration you can easily use in your own makes.
Cut, stamp, and create with Sizzix - tools designed to inspire every crafter. Bring your ideas to life and discover creative inspiration, plus exclusive deals this hour.
Join AALL & Create and tune in for fabulous demos and amazing deals - a crafty hour awaits with new stamps, dies, stencils, washi tape and more.
Don't miss 60 minutes of irresistible deals - perfect for crafters stocking up or trying something new! Tune in for fresh inspiration and ideas for your next crafty project.

HobbyMaker Repeats.
HobbyMaker Repeats.
HobbyMaker Repeats.
...Collections: Three brand new fabric collections, all with a feature panel.
Sara Kear-Smith is back with brand new project including a brand new quilt kit using Moda Joy of Life French General.
Need some help with the right gadget to help you with your project - look no further, we have some great dressmaking tools.
Sara Kear-Smith is back for her second hour bringing more amazing kits & Stylecraft yarns.
...Computerised Combo: Jayne Brogan is back on Sewing Street, and demos the Elna eXpressive 808 Computerised Sewing & Embroidery Combo.
We're turning 4 today. Our birthday celebrations kick off with Elements of HobbyMaker, a special collaboration with WOW Embossing Powders and our special guest, Liam.
Start your charm collection with this elegant bracelet! Designed to showcase your passion for crafting, it's the perfect base for our beautiful crafting-themed clip-on charms.
There is so much to enjoy in the latest Crafting with Hunkydory magazine, with 100 full-colour pages featuring step-by-step instructions for over 100 projects and free gifts.
Emma's on the guest list! She's joining our birthday celebrations with a special selection of Silicone Mould Sets, complete with matching craft papers and pre-cut ephemera.
Cut, score, craft, and create with perfect accuracy using the new Master Creator Scoreboard and accessories, paired with 12x16 White Pearl Card for flawless results every time.
Packed full of tall and elegant images in an unique format, Delightful Days Bookmark Toppers is the perfect collection to bring a world of creativity to your crafting.
Emma's on the guest list! She's joining our birthday celebrations with a special selection of Silicone Mould Sets, complete with matching craft papers and pre-cut ephemera.
4-for-3 birthday treats are here to make your crafting even sweeter! Grab your favourite supplies and enjoy extra goodies for every hobbymaker as we celebrate 4 fabulous years.
Anne-Marie is here with the Easter Bauble Buddies Project Kit, including everything you need to create the cutest springtime characters with round bauble tummies.
Birthday launch alert! Hayley is here with the all-new Fancy Nesting Dies Curved Collection and Doodled Delights stamp & die sets - perfect to mix and match across your projects.
Final hour of the day! We're embracing what we're best known for - creativity, fun, and all things crafty. Don't miss exclusive offers from the team to celebrate 4 fabulous years.
